events.name: [Megathon W8] - Hackathon Windows 8 - Barcelona
events.about:
Megathon Windows 8 es el primer hackathon multiciudad para Windows 8. 

Durante los días 7, 8 y 9 de Septiembre programadores de toda España se reunirán para crear contrarreloj las mejores apps para Windows 8 para conseguir fabulos premios.

En el site http://megathonwindows8.azurewebsites.net tienes las últimas novedades y toda la formación gratuita sobre la creación y diseño de apps metro para que llegues preparado al hackathon.

Inscríbete ya en la edición de Barcelona. 

7 de septiembre

Inicio
17:00 ~ 17:30 – Acreditación de los participantes

17:30 ~ 18:00 – Presentación de proyectos

18:00 ~ 18:30 – Formación de los equipos

Hackathon
18:30 ~ 21:30 – Las 3 primeras horas de programación

Formación
18:30 ~ 19:40 – Formación: Plataforma de desarrollo de Windows 8 para apps Metro

8 de septiembre

Hackathon
10:00 ~ 20:00 – Toda una jornada para programar.

Formación
11:00 ~ 12:00 – Formación: Lo que los desarrolladores Web deberían saber para construir apps Metro  de Windows 8

12:00 ~ 13:00 – Formación: Construyendo el UI para las apps Metro de Windows 8

17:00 ~ 18:00 – Formación: Integrar Contratos en las apps de Windows 8

18:00 ~ 19:00 – Formación: Cómo dar vida a tus apps con las Notificaciones y Life Tiles.

9 de septiembre

Hackathon
10:00 ~ 17:00 – Últimas 5 horas de programación

Formación
11:00 ~ 12:00 – Formación: Gestión del ciclo de vida de una app Metro de Windows 8

12:00 ~ 13:00 - Formación: Cómo sacar provecho del hardware moderno en apps Metro de Windows 8.

Fin
17:00 ~ 18:00 – Presentación del proyectos

18:00 ~ 19:00 – Anuncio de ganadores y entrega de premios locales

events.name: Hackathon for Social Good - Barcelona
events.about:
Join web and mobile experts on Wed., July 4th  in an all day Hackathon for Social Good. Hackathons are events when programmers and designers meet to work collaboratively to build programs and applications.

The day will begin with short presentations by educators and non-profit organizations, followed by informational sessions on building sites and web applications to help benefit non-profit organizations.

SCHEDULE:

09:00am - Sign in / Coffee and Refreshments

09:30am - Opening message; review the days process

09:45am - Brief presentations from non-profit groups

10:00am - Brainstorm ideas for web and/or mobile tools or apps; Divide into groups to develop projects.

10:15am - Break

10:30am - Develop design, programming and production plan and assignments; begin design and development.

12:15pm - Lunch break

01:15pm - Project development

04:15pm - Finalization and testing

05:00pm - Present projects to judges

05:20pm - Hackathon winner announced

If you have a great coding and design mindset, put your talents to the task and help create tools to solve local community needs.

Teams will compete to deliver the most compelling and appealing solutions, and the winning team members will win a free day conference pass to WebVisions for Fri., July 6 and Sat., July 7, where the Hackathon winners will be announced on the Main Stage.

The Hackathon for Social Good is held during WebVisions Barcelona, a nationally recognized event that explores the future of Web and mobile design, technology, user experience and business strategy.

events.name: La Fiesta Hackathon
events.about:
You are cordially invited to La Fiesta Hackathon!

The Hackathon takes place around the world - you can participate from any corner of the World.

Develop an app for Blaast, Windows, Android or iOS submit, and present it via Skype at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona on the 28th February, 2012.

Not only can you win fame and glory, we have actual prizes too. 

1) The winning team is awarded with tickets to the Mobile World Congress 2013. 
2) The first runner-up - € 500 gift certificate to Amazon.com.
3) The second runner-up – € 250 gift certificate to Amazon.com

The Hackathon Award Ceremony takes place at 18:00  ( GMT+1 ) in Mobile World Congress, Barcelona. Winners will be informed through live telecast using Skype.

So, get your team together and be part of something truly awesome!

Rules

  • Only new prototypes can be submitted and developed by the members of the team.
  • We understand prototype as those apps which are not in commercial phase. That is, they are not available in any of the app stores/markets or by similar means.
  • After evaluating the prototypes the judge will meet and select the winner projects that will be announced the same day.
  • The application must not contain any sexual, violent or racist content implicit or explicit at all.
  • The application must not promote any activity that can be dangerous or with political messages.
  • The submitted project must not contain material with any copyright or intellectual property owned by third parties or any picture, image, name or similar that could identify a person without his/her written permission.
  • Participants can use frameworks (e.g. phonegap, sencha touch, jqtouch,...) but they must mention it when submitting their project.

Sign up requirements

Note : Sign up as a team and we will send a detailed signup form later to the teams registered  through email where you can fill up below informations. )

Each team leader should provide:

  • Number of total members in the team
  • Leader name and surname
  • Short description about concept / idea.
  • Contact email
  • Contact phone number
  • Provide skype id for voice/video vall for presentation and live feedback.

Judging criteria for winner

  • Usability / Design ( 10 pts )
  • Creativity ( 10 pts )
  • Performance ( 10 pts )

Organized by

Finnish Mobile Association & Aalto Center for Entrepreneurship

Supported by

Windows Phone Aalto Community & Android Aalto Community

events.name: API Hackday Barcelona
events.about:
API Hackday Barcelona brings developers together for an all-day coding fest focused on building apps and mashups with APIs. Developers of all experience levels can share ideas, collaborate on existing projects, start new ventures, and find out about great tools and powerful APIs.

Free admission, Free Food! Snacks, coffee, lunch, beer

Hackers will also hear from some of the worlds top API-focused companies on tips, tricks, and tools for building the next big app. At the end of the day, teams and/or individuals get a chance to present their work to a panel of judges and win awesome prizes.

Brought to you by Mashery, Teambox, dotopen, appMobi, 3scale, SendGrid and Twilio

Tweet about it using the #apihackday hashtag.

Tentative schedule:

  • 8:00 - 9.00 Registration / Breakfast

  • 9:00 - 9:30 Intro / API Workshops

  • 9:30 - 12:30 Start hacking!

  • 13:30 - 14:30 Lunch

  • 14:30 - 18:30  Keep hacking!

  • 18:30 - Submission Deadline

  • 18:45 - 19:15  Presentations

  • 19:15 - 19:30 Judging

  • 19:30 - 19:45 Awards

  • 19:45 - Go out for drinks

 

Prizes:

Coming Soon!
